headline: Bank of America Declares Fourth Quarter 2025 Stock Dividends
summary: Bank of America Corporation today announced the Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend on Bank of America common stock of $0.28 per share, payable on December 26, 2025 to shareholders of record as of December 5, 2025.

raw.headline: Bank of America Declares Fourth Quarter 2025 Stock Dividends
raw.summary: Bank of America Corporation today announced the Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend on Bank of America common stock of $0.28 per share, payable on December 26, 2025 to shareholders of record as of December 5, 2025.

headline: BofA Names Andy Noll President of Columbus
summary: Bank of America has named Andy Noll, Business Banking executive, president of Bank of America Columbus. He succeeds Kelly D'Ambrosia, who led the market since 2021 and recently relocated to Dallas.

raw.headline: BofA Names Andy Noll President of Columbus
raw.summary: Bank of America has named Andy Noll, Business Banking executive, president of Bank of America Columbus. He succeeds Kelly D'Ambrosia, who led the market since 2021 and recently relocated to Dallas.

headline: What Credit-Card Trends Tell Us About the U.S. Consumer, in Charts
summary: There is a trade war, a government shutdown and a sluggish job market, but households are still spending.

headline: Warren Buffett’s Secret Weapon for 2026
summary: As Warren Buffett prepares to hand over leadership of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-A)(NYSE:BRK-B) to Greg Abel by year’s end, his strategy remains focused on resilience amid market uncertainty. Even in his final months at the helm, Buffett has continued trimming major stakes in Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) and Bank of America (NYSE:BAC), reducing exposure to high-valuation sectors. At ... Warren Buffett’s Secret Weapon for 2026

headline: Citi’s Jane Fraser consolidates power with board chair vote — and a $25 million-plus bonus to boot
summary: Citigroup’s board of directors has voted to make CEO Jane Fraser its chair of the board, giving the CEO of a major Wall Street bank a $26 million restricted stock bonus.

raw.headline: Citi’s Jane Fraser consolidates power with board chair vote — and a $25 million-plus bonus to boot
raw.summary: Citigroup’s board of directors has voted to make CEO Jane Fraser its chair of the board, giving the CEO of a major Wall Street bank a $26 million restricted stock bonus.

headline: Quantum stocks soar on report that Trump administration is discussing equity stakes in companies
summary: IonQ, Rigetti Computing, D-Wave and Quantum Computing stocks soared Thursday.

raw.headline: Quantum stocks soar on report that Trump administration is discussing equity stakes in companies

headline: Is Trending Stock Bank of America Corporation (BAC) a Buy Now?
summary: Bank of America (BAC) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.
